Clicking here will open the GUI to create a new character.
[>] Click here to add a new character
screens.wynntils.characterSelection.cann: Upgrade your rank to have more.
screens.wynntils.characterSelection.dele: This will start the deleting procedure of the selected character.
[>] Click here to delete the character
screens.wynntils.characterSelection.edit: Click here to edit a character!
screens.wynntils.characterSelection.name: Wynntils Custom Character Selection
screens.wynntils.characterSelection.play: You can also double click to play
screens.wynntils.guildMap.help.descripti: Shift-Right on a territory to open the territory management menu.
screens.wynntils.guildMap.toggleResource: Click here to switch between resource generation colors and guild colors.
screens.wynntils.lootruns.description1: Here you can see loot runs you have saved. You can also search for a specific lootrun by typing its name. You can go to the next page by clicking on the two buttons or by scrolling your mouse.
screens.wynntils.lootruns.description2: To add loot runs, access the folder for loot runs by running the command /lootrun folder
Left click to load this lootrun
Right click to open this lootrun on map
Shift+Right click to remove this lootrun
Left click to unload this lootrun
Middle click to open lootrun in folder
screens.wynntils.lootruns.name: Lootruns
screens.wynntils.lootruns.noLootruns: No lootruns were found! Try changing your search term.
screens.wynntils.map.focus.description1: Left click here to center around the waypoint.
screens.wynntils.map.focus.description2: Shift-Left click here to center around the player.
screens.wynntils.map.focus.name: Center
screens.wynntils.map.help.description2: Left click on waypoint to place the compass marker.
screens.wynntils.map.help.description3: Middle click to place the compass marker on the map.
screens.wynntils.map.help.description4: Shift-Middle click on the map to create a waypoint.
screens.wynntils.map.help.description5: Shift-Middle click on a waypoint to edit it.
screens.wynntils.map.help.description6: Alt-Middle click on a waypoint to remove it.
screens.wynntils.map.help.description7: Left click on the compass marker to remove it.
screens.wynntils.map.help.description8: Right click to center on player.
screens.wynntils.map.help.description9: Shift-Right click to center on the compass marker.
screens.wynntils.map.help.name: Quick Guide
screens.wynntils.map.share.description1: §bLeft click§7 to share your location with your guild.
screens.wynntils.map.share.description2: §bRight click§7 to share your location with your party.
screens.wynntils.map.share.description3: §bShift§7 to share your compass pin location instead.
screens.wynntils.map.share.name: Share Location
screens.wynntils.map.waypoints.add.descr: Click here to create a new waypoint.
screens.wynntils.map.waypoints.add.name: Create a new Waypoint
screens.wynntils.overlayManagement.name: Overlay Management Screen
screens.wynntils.overlaySelection.name: Overlay Selection Screen
screens.wynntils.settingsScreen.name: Wynntils Settings
screens.wynntils.settingsScreen.title: Wynntils Settings
screens.wynntils.wynntilsDialogueHistory: Here you can read your last few conversations with NPCs on your current class.
Click here to open the quest book
No dialogues found! Try reloading dialogues by pressing the button in the top right corner.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsDiscoveries.des: See and sort all of your discoveries in one place.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsDiscoveries.fil: You can use the filters below.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsDiscoveries.lef: Left click to set compass beacon!
screens.wynntils.wynntilsDiscoveries.mid: Middle click to view on map!
screens.wynntils.wynntilsDiscoveries.noD: No discoveries found! Try changing your search term or reloading discoveries by pressing the button in the top right corner.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsDiscoveries.rig: Right click to open on the wiki!
screens.wynntils.wynntilsDiscoveries.scr: Here you can see all the discoveries.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsGuides.descript: See all the guides in Wynntils.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsGuides.itemGuid: Shift + Right Click to open on WynnData
screens.wynntils.wynntilsGuides.name: Guides
screens.wynntils.wynntilsGuides.screenDe: Here you can see all the guides Wynntils has. These guides usually show all the items of a specific category.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsMenu.configs.de: Change the settings the way you want.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsMenu.descriptio: Welcome to Wynntils! You can see your statistics on the right or select one of the options above for more features.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsMenu.name: Wynntils Menu
screens.wynntils.wynntilsMenu.overlayCon: Enable or disable and change the positions and sizes of various Wynntils overlays.
See and pin all your currently available quests.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsQuestBook.descr: Here you can see all quests available for you. You can also search for specific quests just by typing its name. You can go to the next page by clicking the two buttons or scrolling your mouse.
You can pin and unpin a quest by clicking on it.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsQuestBook.dialo: Click here to view your dialogue history
screens.wynntils.wynntilsQuestBook.lootr: Click here to view your lootruns.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsQuestBook.mainM: Click here to view the main map.
screens.wynntils.wynntilsQuestBook.name: Wynntils Quest Book
Quests are sorted by distance, closest first
Quests are sorted by level, lowest first
screens.wynntils.wynntilsQuestBook.tryRe: No quests found! Try reloading quests by pressing the button in the top right corner.
